00038 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 |   AP4_SttsTableEntry
00040 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00041 class AP4_SttsTableEntry {
00042  public:
00043     AP4_SttsTableEntry() : 
00044         m_SampleCount(0), 
00045         m_SampleDuration(0) {}
00046     AP4_SttsTableEntry(AP4_Cardinal sample_count,
00047                        AP4_Duration sample_duration) :
00048         m_SampleCount(sample_count),
00049         m_SampleDuration(sample_duration) {}
00050 
00051     AP4_Cardinal m_SampleCount;
00052     AP4_Duration m_SampleDuration;
00053 };
00054 
00055 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 |   AP4_SttsAtom
00057 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00058 class AP4_SttsAtom : public AP4_Atom
00059 {
00060 public:
00061     // class methods
00062     static AP4_SttsAtom* Create(AP4_Size size, AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00063 
00064     // methods
00065     AP4_SttsAtom();
00066     virtual AP4_Result InspectFields(AP4_AtomInspector& inspector);
00067     virtual AP4_Result GetDts(AP4_Ordinal sample, AP4_TimeStamp& dts);
00068     virtual AP4_Result AddEntry(AP4_UI32 sample_count, AP4_UI32 sample_duration);
00069     virtual AP4_Result GetSampleIndexForTimeStamp(AP4_TimeStamp ts, 
00070                                                   AP4_Ordinal&  sample_index);
00071     virtual AP4_Result WriteFields(AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00072 
00073 private:
00074     // methods
00075     AP4_SttsAtom(AP4_UI32        size, 
00076                  AP4_UI32        version,
00077                  AP4_UI32        flags,
00078                  AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00079 
00080     // members
00081     AP4_Array<AP4_SttsTableEntry> m_Entries;
00082     struct {
00083         AP4_Ordinal   entry_index;
00084         AP4_Ordinal   sample;
00085         AP4_TimeStamp dts;
00086     } m_LookupCache;
00087 };
